text: It is difficult for a woman to define her feelings in language which is chiefly made by men to express theirs.
author: Thomas Hardy

text: Most men are very attached to the idea of being male, and usually experience a lot of fear and insecurity around the idea of being a man. Most women are very identified with their gender, and also experience a tremendous amount of fear and insecurity.
author: Andrew Cohen

text: Men do not have to cook their food they do so for symbolic reasons to show they are men and not beasts.
author: Edmund Leach

text: Something unpleasant is coming when men are anxious to tell the truth.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

text: Men are so necessarily mad, that not to be mad would amount to another form of madness.
author: Blaise Pascal
